name: Decree
description: You command up to a standard tier creature within a short (10 unit) distance to take an action by making a presence check against their resilience. The command becomes invalid at the start of your next turn. You can force them to fall (go prone), halt (0 movement speed), drop (unequip a piece of equipment or drop an object) or any other command that does not directly cause them to harm themselves or an ally.
charge: Your command affects creatures within a very short (5 unit) area around you, but only targets minions and grunts.
